answers.answer: Dear pandah,Diabetes affects the small blood vessels in the eyes can cause some serious problems in the eyes, including bleeding and swelling.  There are treatments and you should speak with your sister about the treatments recommended for her eyes.  Make sure she is under the care of an eyeMD.Dr. FeldmanSandy T. Feldman, M.D., M.S.ClearView Eye and Laser Medical CenterSan Diego, California

question: im not sure if this is what my sister has but she is a diabetic and the doc just told her she has bleeding and swelling behind her eyes,what could cause this and what are the risk?
title: diabetes
